name: Bunny AI
summary: Bunny.net joined the AI hype and created ‚ÄúBunny AI‚Äù (docs), AI images created on the edge. I tried it out, because it‚Äôs currently free during the preview, but somehow I don‚Äôt find the generated images aesthetic or I‚Äôm just to stupid to write better prompts. I guess the Bunny developers also need some distraction from time to time, because they are working hard on S3 support for Bunny Storage for years already. üê∞

content.html:
My website is powered by GoBlog, a simple and dynamic blogging system that‚Äôs open source, actively developed and implements most IndieWeb functionalities. It packages everything in a single binary and I‚Äôve been so over the moon using it and seeing it improve week after week that I‚Äôm surprised it isn‚Äôt more popular. So I put on my evangelist boots to share how I use this ‚Äústupidly-simple‚Äù blogging system to power my online presence.

Thanks, Andr√©s, for all your great improvement ideas, will to try out all the undocumented features, your feedback and for sharing GoBlog! üòÑ

name: Forgejo
summary: A few weeks ago, it came to light that Gitea has been owned by a for-profit Gitea Ltd. for several months. The lack of transparency has disturbed the trust of many contributors and users. That‚Äôs why Codeberg (a German based non-profit association - disclaimer: I am a member of the association) has now started a soft fork: Forgejo.

content.html:
I should write better tests or at least create some automatic tests. üò¨ (But ActivityPub is so complicated to test!)

Due to some mistakes in my blog‚Äôs ActivityPub implementation, I lost all my followers and my posts didn‚Äôt send. Glad that I have some backup and was able to reimport all followers from 2022-12-10 02:00. üòÖ If you followed me after that time, please re-follow to get my posts in your user‚Äôs inbox. üòä

And now, good night! üò¥

name: Should I sell my PC?
summary: I‚Äôm not sure yet what I‚Äôm going to do with my desktop computer (ASRock Deskmini A300), which I don‚Äôt really use anymore since I got my new laptop.

content.html: I think it was a very wise decision to buy some long merino underwear, a new and warmer jacket and new winter shoes. It‚Äôs so cold! The whole week already under 0¬∞C.
content.value: I think it was a very wise decision to buy some long merino underwear, a new and warmer jacket and new winter shoes. It‚Äôs so cold! The whole week already under 0¬∞C.

content.html: I‚Äôm honestly thinking about switching browsers, because this ‚Äúnew feature‚Äù where Firefox always downloads PDFs first to display them is annoying me so much. I don‚Äôt want my Downloads folder to be cluttered with all those random PDFs. If I open a restaurant‚Äôs menu PDF, I just want to take a quick look, but don‚Äôt want to have the PDF in my Downloads folder until I manually delete it and then delete it from the Recycle Bin again. There are some work-arounds, but no real solution.
content.value: I‚Äôm honestly thinking about switching browsers, because this ‚Äúnew feature‚Äù where Firefox always downloads PDFs first to display them is annoying me so much. I don‚Äôt want my Downloads folder to be cluttered with all those random PDFs. If I open a restaurant‚Äôs menu PDF, I just want to take a quick look, but don‚Äôt want to have the PDF in my Downloads folder until I manually delete it and then delete it from the Recycle Bin again. There are some work-arounds, but no real solution.

content.html: I use Firefox as my preferred web browser both on PCs and my phone. One extension is always installed: uBlock Origin. The web is so much nicer with all the ads and tracking removed. But today I also retried an extension that will probably join the ‚Äúmust install‚Äù list: DarkReader. Especially when I‚Äôm browsing the web on my phone in the early morning, I don‚Äôt like to be blinded by white websites. Since March DarkReader has finally an option to detect if a website already has a dark theme and only apply it‚Äôs color changes to those who haven‚Äôt.

Since March DarkReader has finally an option to detect if a website already has a dark theme and only apply it‚Äôs color changes to those who haven‚Äôt.

name: Thinking about chat apps again‚Ä¶
summary: Lately, I‚Äôve been thinking about chat apps more often again. Actually, I‚Äôve always been a fan of Telegram, and it‚Äôs still a good messenger, but I‚Äôm a bit suspicious about the latest developments (such as the Fragment platform, with which Telegram is now implementing its crypto plans again).

https://darkreader.org/blog/detect-dark-.text: an option to detect if a website already has a dark theme
